metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Extended Theme Song - Steven Universe is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Extended Theme Song - Steven Universe has sections analyzed in the following keys: F Major, C Major,  and G Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
